metadata.name: Spin the Wheel
metadata.description: Award randomised rewards with a branded spinning wheel.

defaults.title: Spin the Wheel
defaults.description: Players spin the wheel once per eligible session to receive a random reward.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Game title
fields.description: Headline displayed at the top of the experience.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Supporting copy that explains how the wheel works.

fields.name: wheelImage
fields.label: Wheel image
fields.description: PNG or SVG of the wheel face (2048 × 2048 px recommended).

fields.name: pointerImage
fields.label: Pointer image
fields.description: Pointer or indicator asset (transparent PNG preferred).

fields.name: backgroundImage
fields.label: Background image
fields.description: Background image for the experience. 1920 × 1080 px recommended.

fields.name: spinButtonImage
fields.label: Spin button image
fields.description: Asset for the spin trigger button.

fields.name: maxSpinsPerUser
fields.label: Max spins per user
fields.description: Maximum number of spins allowed per user for the campaign.

fields.name: spinCooldownSeconds
fields.label: Spin cooldown (seconds)
fields.description: Cooldown period before a user can spin again.

fields.name: submissionEndpoint
fields.label: Submission endpoint
fields.description: Endpoint that records the prize awarded after a spin completes.

fields.name: prizeSegments
fields.label: Prize segments
fields.description: Defines the wheel segments and win probabilities.
